page.description: The EMAIL_PROFILE_VALID() function checks the specified email profile and returns TRUE (.T.) if it has all necessary information; otherwise, it returns FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) = the profile has all necessary information FALSE (.F.) = the profile is incomplete or has invalid values. Character

argument.name: profile
argument.description: The name of the email profile to evaluate. Character
